greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of representations of n as the difference of two positive triangular numbers.
link: Robert G. Wilson v, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..54000.
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{c = 0, k = 1}, While[k < n, If[ IntegerQ[ Sqrt[8 n + 4 k (k + 1) + 1]], c++ ]; k++ ]; c]; Table[f@n, {n, 105}]
results.author: _John W. Layman_ and _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 12 2007
